LanguageData.RSChargeStation.label: Maintenance Station
LanguageData.RSChargeStation.description: Allows Peacekeeper robots to recharge and get automatically repaired. Repairs require the station being supplied with components, recharging only requires energy.
LanguageData.RSRobotAssemblyBench.label: Peacekeeper assembly bench
LanguageData.RSRobotAssemblyBench.description: A non-commercial assembly bench developed by SRS for the manufacturing of SRS Robots.
LanguageData.RSTurretLLT.label: Light laser turret
LanguageData.RSTurretLLT.description: Basic Laser Defense System from Saturn Robotics System.
LanguageData.RSTurretLLTBullet.label: light laser
LanguageData.RSTurretLLTGun.label: autocannon
LanguageData.RSTurretLLTGun.description: Basic Laser Defense System from Saturn Robotics System.
LanguageData.RSTurretHLT.label: Heavy laser turret
LanguageData.RSTurretHLT.description: An Advanced Laser Defense System from Saturn Robotics System.
LanguageData.RSTurretHLTBullet.label: autocannon shell
LanguageData.RSTurretHLTGun.label: heavy laser
LanguageData.RSTurretHLTGun.description: An Advanced Laser Defense System from Saturn Robotics System.
LanguageData.RSTurretHAAC.label: HAAC
LanguageData.RSTurretHAAC.description: A Heavy Anti Armour Cannon developed by Saturn Robotics Systems.
LanguageData.RSMissile.label: rocket
LanguageData.RSTurretHAACBullet.label: HAAC shell
LanguageData.RSTurretHAACGun.label: autocannon
LanguageData.RSTurretHAACGun.description: A Heavy Anti Armour Cannon developed by Saturn Robotics Systems.
LanguageData.RSTurretBulletTest.label: autocannon shell
LanguageData.RSFilthCoolant.label: Coolant

LanguageData.RSPeacekeeperDefenderForestSpawner.label: Peacekeeper Defender
LanguageData.RSPeacekeeperDefenderDesertSpawner.label: Peacekeeper Defender

LanguageData.RSSRSProcessingChip.label: SRS processing chip
LanguageData.RSSRSProcessingChip.description: The SRS Processing Chip is a vital part of manufacturing SRS Robots and without it and the assembly bench, all SRS robots are inoperable without the chip. They can be bought through SRS Trade Ships and can be salvaged from destroyed SRS units.
LanguageData.RSPowerCell.label: SRS power cell
LanguageData.RSPowerCell.description: The SRS Power Cell is often used to refuel SRS Robots. They can be built via the Assembly bench or can be bought through SRS Trade Ships.
LanguageData.RSWeaponDLG.label: DLG-20
LanguageData.RSWeaponDLG.description: A standard issued Defender Burst Laser Rifle for short to medium range engagements.
LanguageData.RSWeaponDLG.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.RSWeaponDLG.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.RSWeaponDLGBullet.label: charge shot
LanguageData.RSWeaponEHG.label: EHG-22
LanguageData.RSWeaponEHG.description: A standard issued Enforcer Heavy Laser Minigun for short to medium range engagements.
LanguageData.RSWeaponEHG.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.RSWeaponEHG.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.RSWeaponEHGBullet.label: charge shot
LanguageData.RSWeaponSHAG.label: SHAG-1
LanguageData.RSWeaponSHAG.description: A standard issued heavy assault gun used by Sentinels in a supporting role whether it is a in an offensive or defensive capacity.
LanguageData.RSWeaponSHAG.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.RSWeaponSHAG.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.RSWeaponSHAGBullet.label: charge shot
